Filming employed 3D cameras similar to those used in the production of the 2009 film Avatar, and ten companies were involved with the film's visual effects. Following inflated production costs which ballooned the net budget to $379 million, the film was the most expensive film ever made at the time of its release.
When was Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides released? Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides release year

Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides was released on May 18 and May 20, 2011 in North America. The movie was the fourth movie in the Pirates of the Caribbean francise by Disney and the first and currently the only to be directed by Rob Marshall.
